original_text: Therefore thus saith the Lord God of hosts, O my people that dwellest in Zion, be not afraid of the Assyrian: he shall smite thee with a rod, and shall lift up his staff against thee, after the manner of Egypt.
korean_text: 그러므로 주 만군의 여호와께서 이르시되 시온에 거주하는 내 백성들아 앗수르가 애굽이 한 것처럼 막대기로 너를 때리며 몽둥이를 들어 너를 칠지라도 그를 두려워하지 말라

sentences.original_text: Therefore thus saith the Lord God of hosts
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 만군의 주 하나님이 이렇게 말씀하시니

sentences.original_text: O my people that dwellest in Zion
be not afraid of the Assyrian
he shall smite thee with a rod
and shall lift up his staff against thee
